response.job_title: High Voltage Expert at 3E | Electrical Engineer and Data Analyst | Renewable Energies Enthusiast
response.summary:
Electrical engineer with more than 12 years of experience in management, design, and supervision of High Voltage electrical projects (Overhead and Underground Transmission Lines and Substations). With designs that totaled more than 750 km of Overhead Power Lines designed and 32 km of Underground Power Lines designed. Qualified to work with and lead engineering teams to adapt to changing stakeholder requirements and exogenous variables, using Agile methodologies.
Highly skilled in software employed in transmission lines (PLS-CADD, CymCAP), drafting (AutoCAD, Civil 3D), GIS (ArcGIS, qGIS), project management (Microsoft Project, PowerBI), electrical design (ETAP, ATP-Draw), and programming (Python, Java).
Used to prepare technical documents, interpretation of standards, and regulations in the electrical field, as well as support activities in power lines design, such as topographic surveys, soil studies, and social-environmental studies.
With additional professional experience in electrical infrastructure projects such as substations, wind, and solar power plants, mining, and oil & gas. All these projects involved dealing with multidisciplinary teams using communication skills for teamwork coordination and critical decision-making in the face of unforeseen circumstances.
Fluency in several languages, particularly English, with experience working in a native environment. In addition, proficient in French and Catalan.
response.skills: Renewable Energy, Power Systems, MATLAB, Alta Tension, ETAP, Project Coordination, High-Voltage Engineering, Data Science, Budget Control, Data Analysis, Business Planning, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical, Electrical, and Plumbing (MEP), Project Management, PLS-CADD, Autodesk Civil 3D, ArcGIS Desktop, CYMCAP, Adobe Campaign, Business Intelligence (BI)

profile_positions.description:
- Information reorganization in a readable way to develop reports and analysis for data-driven decision-making.
 - Reports managing and design, including data sources, data reliability, by creating metrics (KPIs) based on data mining, for daily business monitoring.
- Use of statistical tools to identify, analyze and interpret patterns and trends in complex data sets for diagnosis and prediction.
- Deliver data through reports with tables and graphs in an understandable way for presentation to any stakeholder of the company, facilitating decision-making based on facts and trends.
- Remove useless data and improve code efficiency to achieve reduced Workflows.
profile_positions.title: Data Analyst

profile_positions.description:
-	Managed and coordinated project as direct communication channel with across the Americas (Colombia, USA, Panama, Ecuador, Chile).
-	Develop new solutions to make the design process more efficient and error-free, including software development and managing large datasets and databases.
-	Engineering consulting to reduce costs and optimize construction processes to provide tangible benefits to the client.
-	Results and improvements made were displayed and discussed with stakeholders using PMI tools
profile_positions.title: Professional Engineer 1

profile_positions.description:
- Design of high and extra high voltage transmission lines throughout America.
- Learning-by-working on the design of high and extra high voltage underground lines.
profile_positions.title: Professional Engineer 2

profile_positions.description: - Performed electrical installations of buildings of up to 20,000 m² and medium voltage networks were designed in the states of Maryland, Virginia, and the District of Columbia. - Worked in a multicultural environment that allowed take projects to their final properly. - Experience with multitasking teams by using BIM technologies for MAP projects. - Acquired experience to develop MEP (Mechanical, electrical, plumbing) projects with the involvement of several disciplines. Results: I performed outstandingly, with several recognitions from bosses and coworkers, I was not able to renew my work visa to continue working with the company. I delivered all my tasks ahead time and left a good image with contacts that last until today.
profile_positions.title: Observer Electrical Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- QA/QC was carried out for the design and construction of a 230 kV transmission line in the Meta department, the design included the evaluation of the designs, the execution process, and the development of the project, from the beginning of the engineering to the construction and commissioning.
- The improvement in engineering practices towards the consultant in charge was highlighted, through appropriate recommendations of the QA/QC carried out.
- An accompaniment was carried out in the field to understand the needs of the community that required knowing the scope and impact of the project.
- The tasks required for the environmental licensing process of the project were carried out.
profile_positions.title: QA/QC Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Designed more than 300 km of high and extra high voltage transmission lines for several customers in energy and mining sector. Follow-up during project construction to completion.
- Designed electrical installations for hydroelectric, mining, and utilities up to 50,000 m², follow-up was made during construction phase.
profile_positions.title: Transmission Lines Engineer

profile_positions.description: I worked in electrical installations for: hospitals, urban planning, population centers, mining, Oil & Gas, roads, and other types of infrastructure.
profile_positions.title: Auxiliary engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Worked on transmission lines design for key projects in the country development.
- Promoted from an internship to full time engineer inside the company.
profile_positions.title: Intern

company.name: 3E
company.description:
3E is a leading technology and SaaS company providing digital solutions and expert services that maximise the performance of renewable energy assets. As a trusted data services partner, we deliver future-proof and easy-to-deploy solutions over a project’s entire lifetime, supporting developers, asset managers, operators, investors, EPC contractors and IPP's. 

3E's one-stop digital platform SynaptiQ provides a complete range of leading SaaS solutions for development, operational asset management and analytics. In addition, 3E supplies various expert services for engineering, technical and strategic decision support.

3E has a proven track record spanning more than 20 years across 60 countries. It operates an international team of 100+ experts from its headquarters in Brussels and offices in Barcelona, Paris, Toulouse, Cape Town and Chennai. 

Strengthened by partnerships with universities and industry pioneers, 3E continues to explore innovations and new developments in renewable energy and digitalisation, striving to provide the industry’s most advanced energy intelligence and AI-based solutions. 

Interested in working for us? 

Follow this link: http://jobs.3e.eu/en/index.aspx
